GR14jivrkadu:4: [*NOTE: This verse is used by Jiva as the maṅgalācaraṇa in other works
GR14jivrkadu:11: tatra kaścit śāstra-pramāṇakatvaṃ na manyate, taṃ pratīdaṃ brūmaḥ -
GR14jivrkadu:12: lakṣmīr abhitaḥ strītamā gopyo lakṣmītamāḥ prathitāḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:13: rādhā gopītamā ced asyāḥ kā samā rāmā ||4|| iti ||
GR14jivrkadu:14: [*NOTE: This verse is quoted at Gopāla-campū 1.25.]
GR14jivrkadu:17: [*NOTE: Portions of RKAD have been lifted wholesale from the Sandarbhas.]
GR14jivrkadu:18: atra ca nirṇeṣyamāṇā svayaṃ bhagavataḥ śrī-kṛṣṇasya svayaṃ lakṣmī-rūpā
GR14jivrkadu:20: gopī-jana-mātra-saṃvalitaḥ sa upāsyata ity atra śāstrāṇi śṛṇu
GR14jivrkadu:22: ārādhanaṃ hi kṛṣṇasya bhaved āvaśyakaṃ yathā |
GR14jivrkadu:25: [*NOTE: This verse is, but for mukundasya in the place of hi kṛṣṇasya, the same as LBhāg 2.1. The following section follows closely on LBhāg 2.]
GR14jivrkadu:31: yo nārcayati kalpaḥ san tasmāt pāpataro hi kaḥ ||6||
GR14jivrkadu:34: yo nārcayati deveśaṃ taṃ vidyād brahma-ghātakam ||7||
GR14jivrkadu:38: puṇḍarīko baliḥ śambhuḥ prahlādo viduro dhruvaḥ ||8||
GR14jivrkadu:39: dālbhyaḥ parāśaro bhīṣmo nāradādyāś ca vaiṣṇavaiḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:40: sevyo hariṃ niṣevyāmī no ced doṣaḥ paraṃ bhavet ||9||
GR14jivrkadu:42: arcayitvā tu govindaṃ tadīyān nārcayanti ye |
GR14jivrkadu:43: na te viṣṇoḥ prasādasya bhājanaṃ dāmbhikā janāḥ ||10||
GR14jivrkadu:47: arcayitvā tu govindaṃ tadīyān nārcayet tu yaḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:48: na sa bhāgavato jñeyaḥ kevalaṃ dāmbhikaḥ smṛtaḥ ||12|| iti |
GR14jivrkadu:49: atra pūrvatra ca tadīya-śabdena tasya bhaktā eva ucyante |
GR14jivrkadu:59: | tathaiva darśitaṃ saptame rājasūyārambhe śrī-yudhiṣṭhirādibhiḥ śiśupālaṃ prati gāli-pradānādinā
GR14jivrkadu:60: ataḥ śrī-bhagavān apy uktaṃ - pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca (Gītā 16.7) ity ārabhya -
GR14jivrkadu:61: tān ahaṃ dviṣataḥ krūrān saṃsāreṣu narādhamān |
GR14jivrkadu:62: kṣipāmy ajasram aśubhān āsurīṣv eva yoniṣu ||13||
GR14jivrkadu:63: āsurīṃ yonim āpannā mūḍhā janmani janmani |
GR14jivrkadu:64: mām aprāpyaiva kaunteya tato yānty adhamāṃ gatim ||14|| (Gītā 16.19-20)
GR14jivrkadu:66: avajānanti māṃ mūḍhā mānuṣīṃ tanum āśritam |
GR14jivrkadu:69: rākṣasīm āsurīṃ caiva prakṛtiṃ mohinīṃ śritāḥ ||16|| (Gītā 9.11-12)
GR14jivrkadu:71: mahātmānas tu māṃ pārtha daivīṃ prakṛtim āśritāḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:74: satataṃ kīrtayanto māṃ yatantaś ca dṛḍhavratāḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:75: namasyantaś ca māṃ bhaktyā nityayuktā upāsate ||18|| (Gītā 9.13-14)
GR14jivrkadu:77: mama pūjato 'py abhi sarvatobhāvenādhikā adhika-mat-prīti-karīty arthaḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:80: eteṣām api sarveṣāṃ prahlādaḥ pravaro mataḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:81: [*NOTE: These two lines are LBhāg 2.8, which finishes yat proktaṃ tasya māhātmyaṃ skānda-bhāgavatādiṣu.]
GR14jivrkadu:88: na brahmaṇo na tu bhavasya na vai ramāyā yan me 'rpitaḥ śirasi padma-karaḥ prasādaḥ || (BhP
GR14jivrkadu:92: bhavān me khalu bhaktānāṃ sarveṣāṃ pratirūpa-dhṛk ||22|||
GR14jivrkadu:95: [*NOTE: LBhāg 2.12, which begins pāṇḍavāḥ sarvataḥ śreṣṭhāḥ.]
GR14jivrkadu:99: yeṣāṃ gṛhān āvasatīti sākṣād gūḍhaṃ paraṃ brahma manuṣya-liṅgam || (7.10.48)
GR14jivrkadu:104: priyaḥ suhṛd vaḥ khalu mātuleya ātmārhaṇīyo vidhi-kṛd guruś ca || (7.10.49)
GR14jivrkadu:107: maunena bhaktyopaśamena pūjitaḥ prasīdatām eṣa sa sātvatāṃ patiḥ || (7.10.50)
GR14jivrkadu:108: vyākhyātaṃ ca śrī-svāmi-caraṇaiḥ - prahlādasya bhāgyaṃ yena devo dṛṣṭaḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:109: vayaṃ tu manda-bhāgyā iti viṣīdantaṃ rājānaṃ praty āha yūyam iti tribhiḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:111: na tu prahlādasya gṛheṣu paraṃ brahma vasati |
GR14jivrkadu:112: na ca tad-darśanārthaṃ munayas tad-gṛhān abhiyanti |
GR14jivrkadu:115: ato yūyam eva tato 'pi samatto 'pi bhūri-bhāgā iti bhāvaḥ || iti |
GR14jivrkadu:119: aho bhojayate yūyaṃ janma-bhājo nṝṇām iha |
GR14jivrkadu:120: yat paśyatā 'sakṛt kṛṣṇaṃ tad-darśanam api yoginām || (10.82.28)
GR14jivrkadu:124: yeṣāṃ gṛhe niraya-vartmani vartatāṃ vaḥ svargāpavarga-viramaḥ svayam āsa viṣṇuḥ || (10.82.30)
GR14jivrkadu:128: na viduḥ santam ātmānaṃ vṛṣṇayaḥ kṛṣṇa-cetasaḥ ||30|| (BhP 10.90.46)
GR14jivrkadu:131: [*NOTE: The first two lines follow LBhāg 2.22. sarvebhyo for bhagavān.]
GR14jivrkadu:132: yādavendrasya yo mantrī śiṣyo bhṛtyaḥ priyo mahān ābālyād eva govinde bhaktir asya sadottamā
GR14jivrkadu:133: [*NOTE: The last two lines are Lbhag 2.25.]
GR14jivrkadu:137: tan naicchad racayan yasya saparyāṃ bāla-līlayā ||32|| (BhP 3.2.2)
GR14jivrkadu:139: vṛṣṇīnāṃ pravaro mantrī kṛṣṇasya dayitaḥ sakhā |
GR14jivrkadu:141: tam āha bhagavān preṣṭhaṃ bhaktam ekāntinaṃ kvacit |
GR14jivrkadu:143: ekādaśe ca (16.24) tvaṃ tu bhāgavateṣv aham iti |
GR14jivrkadu:144: na ca saṅkarṣaṇo na śrīr naivātmā ca yathā bhavān iti ca |
GR14jivrkadu:149: ato mad-vayunaṃ lokaṃ grāhayann iha tiṣṭhatu ||35|| (BhP 3.4.3)
GR14jivrkadu:150: yad yasmād guṇaiḥ sattvādibhir nārdito na pīḍitaḥ guṇātītaḥ ity arthaḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:153: yad āsāṃ prema-mādhuryaṃ sa eṣo 'py abhiyācate ||36|| (LBhāg 2.29)
GR14jivrkadu:157: uddhavaḥ paramaḥ prītas tā namasyann idaṃ jagau ||37|| (BhP 10.47.57)
GR14jivrkadu:162: vāñchanti yad bhava-bhiyo munayo vayaṃ ca
GR14jivrkadu:164: bhāvasya durlabhatvād dhi tāsāṃ tat-siddhaye punaḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:166: [*NOTE: The second line is exactly 2.41, the first line of which is
GR14jivrkadu:170: āsām aho caraṇa-reṇu-juṣām ahaṃ syām vṛndāvane kim api gulma-latauṣadhīnām |
GR14jivrkadu:172: yā dustyajaṃ sva-janam ārya-pathaṃ ca hitvā bhejur mukunda-padavīṃ śrutibhir vimṛgyām ||40|| [BhP 10.47.61]
GR14jivrkadu:173: tasyā mṛgyatvaṃ śrutibhir evoktaṃ, yathā tatraiva --
GR14jivrkadu:174: nibhṛta-marun-manokṣa-dṛḍha-yoga-yujo hṛdi yan munaya upāsate tad-arayo 'pi yayuḥ smaraṇāt
GR14jivrkadu:177: atra pratiyugmāntarasthasyāpi śabdasya dvayena yugma-dvayaṃ pṛthag avamyate |
GR14jivrkadu:178: tataś ca tad brahmākhya tat taṃ munaya upāsate tad arayo 'pi
GR14jivrkadu:186: atra bṛhad-vāmana-purāṇe tāsāṃ prārthanā pūrvakāṇi vākyāni santi |
GR14jivrkadu:188: tad arayo 'pi yayuḥ smaraṇād ity anenāsurāṇām api mokṣa-dātṛtvena anyatayā prasiddhasya śrī-kṛṣṇasyaivālambanatvena labdhatvāt |
GR14jivrkadu:189: tāsām eva tasmin kevalena rāgeṇa bhajana-prasiddheḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:197: ity anena lakṣmyādikā niravaśeṣā eva striyo nāmubhiḥ sālakṣaṇyaṃ prāpnuvantīti vilakṣaṇā |
GR14jivrkadu:198: tatrāpy udagād ity anena sa prasādas tāsu
GR14jivrkadu:199: rāsa-prasaṅge uditavān eva na tu jāta iti svābhāvika-premavatyaḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:200: kevalasya śrī-vṛndāvana-vihāriṇaḥ pūrṇa-bhagavataḥ sarvato vilakṣaṇasya nitya-preyasī-rūpā iti |
GR14jivrkadu:202: tasmāt tābhiḥ saha tasya pūjanam āvaśyakam ity āyātam |
GR14jivrkadu:207: [*NOTE: This is the starting point of the Bhagavat-sandarbha. The two following verses are quoted in section 16 and 21.]
GR14jivrkadu:208: brahmeti paramātmeti bhagavān iti śabdyate ity (BhP 1.2.11) ādinā
GR14jivrkadu:209: śrī-bhagavantaṃ suṣṭhu nirdhārya tasya śakti-dvayī nirūpitā |
GR14jivrkadu:213: ṛte 'rthaṃ yat pratīyeta na pratīyeta cātmani |
GR14jivrkadu:214: tad vidyād ātmano māyāṃ yathābhāso yathā tamaḥ || [BhP 2.9.33]
GR14jivrkadu:217: tri-varṇā varṇitāsmābhiḥ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi || (BhP 11.3.16)
GR14jivrkadu:220: atha yan na spṛśanti na vidur mano buddhīndriyā sarvaiḥ ity (BhP 6.16.20)
GR14jivrkadu:222: tvam ādyaḥ puruṣaḥ sākṣād īśvaraḥ (end page 9) prakṛteḥ paraḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:228: śriyā puṣṭyā girā kāntyā kīrtyā tuṣṭyelayor jayā ity ādi kiyanto bhedāś ca darśitā (BhP 10.39.55)
GR14jivrkadu:229: sā ca śakti-dvayī aparā ceti śrī-viṣṇu-purāṇe
GR14jivrkadu:231: sarva-bhūteṣu sarvātman yā śaktir aparā tava |
GR14jivrkadu:235: vande tām īśvarīṃ parām ||46|| ity anena (ViP 1.19.76-77) ||
GR14jivrkadu:236: tatra prathamā śrī-vaiṣṇavānāṃ jagadvad-upekṣaṇīyā yan-mayī eva khalu tasya jagattā |
GR14jivrkadu:239: tatraikam eva svarūpāṃśitvena śaktimattvena ca virājatīti |
GR14jivrkadu:241: cic-chakti-mattā pradhānena virājamānaṃ bhagavat-saṃjñam āpnotīti tatraiva darśitam eva
GR14jivrkadu:244: [*NOTE: The following passage ending with viśuddhatvam is in BhagS 117.]
GR14jivrkadu:245: tatra tāvad ekasyaiv svarūpasya sattvāc cittād ānandāc ca svarūpa-bhūtā
GR14jivrkadu:248: hlādinī sandhinī saṃvit tvayy ekā sarva-saṃsthitau |
GR14jivrkadu:249: hlāda-tāpa-karī miśrā tvayi no guṇa-varjite ||47|| iti (ViP 1.12.68)
GR14jivrkadu:251: hlādinī āhlāda-karī (end page 10) sandhinī santatā saṃvid vidyā-śaktiḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:254: sā sarva-saṃsthitau sarvasya samyak sthitir yasmāt tasmin sarvādhiṣṭhāna-bhūte tvayy eva na tu jīveṣu ca sā guṇamayī trividhā sā tvayi nāsti |
GR14jivrkadu:268: tatra ca sati ghaṭānāṃ ghaṭatvam iva sarveṣāṃ satāṃ vastūnāṃ pratīter nimittam iti kvacit sattā-svarūpatvena āmnāto 'py asau bhagavān sad eva somyedam agra
GR14jivrkadu:269: āsīd ity atra sad-rūpatvena vyāpadiśyamānā mayā sattāṃ dadhāti dhārayati ca sā sarva-deśa-kāla-dravyādi-prāptikarī sandhinī |
GR14jivrkadu:271: yayā saṃvetti saṃvedayati ca sā saṃvit |
GR14jivrkadu:272: tathā hlāda-rūpo 'pi yayā saṃvid utkaṭa-rūpayā taṃ hlādaṃ saṃvetti saṃvedayati ca sā hlādinīti vivecanīyam |
GR14jivrkadu:273: tad evaṃ tasyā mūla-śaktes try-ātmakatvena siddhe yena sva-prakāśatā-lakṣaṇena tad-vṛtti-viśeṣeṇa svarūpaṃ svayaṃ svarūpa-śaktir
GR14jivrkadu:278: [*NOTE: This entire section beginning with hlādinī sandhinī saṃvit is
GR14jivrkadu:281: sattvādayo na santīśe yatra ca prākṛtā guṇāḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:285: śrī-daśame ca viśuddha-sattvaṃ tava dhāma śāntam ity ādi (BhP 10.27.4)
GR14jivrkadu:286: harir hi nirguṇaḥ sākṣāt puruṣaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:287: sa sarva-dṛg upadraṣṭā taṃ bhajan nirguṇo bhavet || iti [BhP 10.88.5]
GR14jivrkadu:288: ekādaśe ca sattvaṃ rajas tama iti guṇā jīvasya naiva me iti [BhP 11.25.12]
GR14jivrkadu:290: ye caiva sāttvikā bhāvā rājasās tāmasāś ca ye |
GR14jivrkadu:291: matta eveti tān viddhi na tv ahaṃ teṣu te mayi ||
GR14jivrkadu:292: tribhir guṇa-mayair bhāvair ebhiḥ sarvam idaṃ jagat |
GR14jivrkadu:293: mohitaṃ nābhijānāti mām ebhyaḥ param avyayam || iti [Gītā 7.12-3]
GR14jivrkadu:294: tatra cedam eva viśuddha-sattvaṃ sandhiny-aṃśa-pradhānaṃ ced ādhāra-śaktiḥ
GR14jivrkadu:300: tad uktaṃ - yat sātvatāḥ puruṣa-rūpam uśanti sattvaṃ loko yata
GR14jivrkadu:302: [*NOTE: This appears to be evidence that 8 is the original source of the
GR14jivrkadu:310: ete eva viṣṇu-purāṇe lakṣmī-stave spaṣṭīkṛte - (end page 12)
GR14jivrkadu:320: vividhānāṃ muktīnām anyeṣāṃ ca vividhānāṃ phalānāṃ dātrī bhavasīty arthaḥ
GR14jivrkadu:322: [*NOTE: k. This section can be found in RKAD 12-13.] śrutiś ca parāsya
GR14jivrkadu:323: śaktir vividhaiva śrūyate svābhākiī jñāna-bala-kriyā ceti |
GR14jivrkadu:324: athaivambhūtānanta-vṛttikā yā svarūpa-śaktiḥ sā tv iha
GR14jivrkadu:325: bhagavad-vāmāṃśa-vartino mūrtimato lakṣmīr evety āha anapāyinī bhagavatī
GR14jivrkadu:329: tatra hetuḥ sākṣād ātmanaḥ sva-svarūpasya cid-rūpatvāt tasyās
GR14jivrkadu:331: atra sākṣāt-śabdena māyā paraity abhimukhe ca vilajjamānā iti [BhP 2.7.47]
GR14jivrkadu:336: paramātmā harir devaḥ tac-chaktiḥ śrīr ihoditā |
GR14jivrkadu:337: śrīr devī prakṛtiḥ proktā keśavaḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:338: na viṣṇunā vinā devī na hariḥ padmajāṃ vinā ||51|| iti |
GR14jivrkadu:340: nityaiva sā jagan-mātā viṣṇuḥ śrīr anapāyinī |
GR14jivrkadu:341: yathā sarva-gato viṣṇus tathā śrīs tat-sahāyinī ||52||
GR14jivrkadu:344: devatve deva-dehā sā mānuṣatve ca mānuṣī |
GR14jivrkadu:345: harer dehānurūpāṃ vai karoty eṣātmanas tanum ||53|| iti ca |
GR14jivrkadu:346: brahma-saṃhitāyāṃ (5.8) niyatiḥ sā ramā devi tat-priyā tad-vaśaṃ tadā iti |
GR14jivrkadu:347: niyamyate svayaṃ bhagavaty eva niyatābhavatīti svarūpa-bhūtā śaktiḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:350: aparaṃ tv akṣaraṃ yā sā prakṛtir jaḍa-rūpikā |
GR14jivrkadu:351: śrīḥ parā prakṛtiḥ proktā cetanā viṣṇu-saṃśrayā ||54||
GR14jivrkadu:352: tataś ca bhagavān kṛṣṇa-saṃjña eva iti nirdhārite na viṣṇunā |
GR14jivrkadu:353: vinā devītyādi devatve deva-dehā sā ity ādi tadīya-svarūpa-bhūtā
GR14jivrkadu:356: tatra dvayor api pūryoḥ śrī-mahiṣyākhyā jñeyā |
GR14jivrkadu:359: purā kṛṣṇo mahā-tejā yadā prabhāsam āgataḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:362: lakṣam ekaṃ ṣaṣṭhir ete kṛṣṇa-sutāḥ priye || ity upakramya |
GR14jivrkadu:364: tato gopyo mahā devi vidyā yāḥ ṣoḍaśa smṛtāḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:365: tāsāṃ nāmāni te vakṣye tāni hy eka-manāḥ śṛṇu ||
GR14jivrkadu:366: lambinī candrikā kāntā krūrā śāntā mahodayā |
GR14jivrkadu:367: bhīṣaṇī nandinī śokā supūrvā vimalā kṣayā ||
GR14jivrkadu:368: subhadrā śobhanā puṇyā haṃśītā kalāḥ kramāt |
GR14jivrkadu:369: haṃsa eva yataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ paramātmā janārdanaḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:371: candrarūpī mataḥ kṛṣṇa kalā-rūpāstu tāḥ smṛtāḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:374: ṣoḍaśaiva kalā yās tu gopī-rūpā varānane ||
GR14jivrkadu:375: ekaikaśas tāḥ sambhinnāḥ sahasreṇa pṛthak pṛthak |
GR14jivrkadu:376: evaṃ te kathitaṃ devi rahasyaṃ jñāna-sambhavam |
GR14jivrkadu:377: ya etaṃ veda puruṣaḥ jñeyo vaiṣṇavo budhaiḥ ||
GR14jivrkadu:382: haṃsaśītety atra prāptasya haṃsasya vācyam āha haṃsa eveti |
GR14jivrkadu:383: sa ca candra-rūpī candra dṛṣṭāntenanoddeśya ity arthaḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:385: iti tāś ca śaktayaḥ candrasyāmṛtety ādi kalā dṛṣṭāntenoddeśyā ity arthaḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:388: dṛṣṭāntopādānāc candrasya tādṛśatvam āha pratipad iti |
GR14jivrkadu:395: bhagavat-svarūpa-bhūtānām eva satīnāṃ mallānām aśanir ity ādivat
GR14jivrkadu:399: asatāṃ śāstetivat tadīya-śoka-hetutvād evaṃ ca tat-tan-niruktir upapadyate |
GR14jivrkadu:402: tataś candra-rūpī mata kṛṣṇaḥ kalā-rūpas tu tāḥ smṛtā iti sphuṭam eva svarūpa-bhūtatvaṃ darśitam
GR14jivrkadu:405: tad evam abhipretya tāsāṃ lakṣmītvam āha śrī-śukaḥ --
GR14jivrkadu:410: ṭīkā ca - ramābhir lakṣmyā aṃśa-bhūtābhir ity eṣā |
GR14jivrkadu:424: rukmiṇyā ramayopetaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ śriyaḥ patim || (BhP 10.54.60)
GR14jivrkadu:425: ity ādiṣu tasyām eva bhūriśaḥ prasiddheḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:428: asyaiva bhāryā bhavituṃ rukmiṇy arhati nāparā |
GR14jivrkadu:429: asāv apy anavadyātmā bhaiṣmyāḥ samucitaḥ patiḥ ||64|| (BhP 10.53.37)
GR14jivrkadu:430: [*NOTE: From here to darśitavān, KṛṣṇaS 185-186, page 110. See also Gopāla-campū 15.75.]
GR14jivrkadu:431: ataḥ svayaṃ bhagavato 'nurūpatvena svayaṃ lakṣmītvaṃ prasiddham eva |
GR14jivrkadu:439: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi ||65|| iti |
GR14jivrkadu:444: kalātvenaiva nija-rūpatve siddhe punar nija-rūpatayoktiḥ prakaṭa-līlāyāṃ
GR14jivrkadu:446: yata uktaṃ tatraiva śriyaḥ kāntāḥ kāntaḥ parama-puruṣaḥ (5.56) iti |
GR14jivrkadu:449: etad abhiprāyeṇaiva svāyambhuvāgame 'pi śrī-bhū-līlā-śabdaiḥ tat-preyasī-viśeṣatvam upadiṣṭam
GR14jivrkadu:450: ataiva gopījanā vidyā-kalā-preraka ity atra tāpanī-vākye
GR14jivrkadu:451: śrīmad-daśākṣarastha-nāma-niruktau ye gopījanās te ā samyag yā vidyā
GR14jivrkadu:454: rāja-guhyam ity ādi gītā-prakaraṇāt bhagavaty avidyā-saṃśleṣābhāvāt |
GR14jivrkadu:456: tatas tāsāṃ prerakas tat krīḍāyāṃ pravartakaḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:459: janma-jarābhyāṃ bhinna ity ādau sa vo hi svāmī bhavati iti tasyām eva śrutau, tāḥ prati durvāsā-vākyāt |
GR14jivrkadu:465: 10.33.21] ity atra ṭīkā ca ṛṣabhasya patyuḥ iti |
GR14jivrkadu:467: gopīpatir ananto 'pi vaṃśadhvanivaśaṃ gataḥ iti. śrīmac-chaṅkarācārya-kṛte
GR14jivrkadu:468: yamunāstotre ca, vidhehi tasya rādhikādhavāṅghripaṅkaje ratim iti |
GR14jivrkadu:469: uddhavaṃ prati śrī-bhagavatā ca -- ballavyo me madātmikāḥ [BhP 10.46.6]
GR14jivrkadu:471: tad idaṃ gacchoddhava vrajaṃ saumya pitror naḥ prītim āvaha iti [BhP
GR14jivrkadu:472: 10.46.3] (end page 18) vallabhābhimānitām ātmani vyajya śrīkṛṣṇasya vacanaṃ brāhmaṇasya mama brāhmaṇīty ādivat gopa-rūpasya mama gopī-rūpā ity arthaḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:473: atas tāsām api tathaivābhimānaṃ tatraivoktam -- api bata madhupuryāṃ āryaputro 'dhunāste iti (10.47.11) |
GR14jivrkadu:475: saṅkalpa-vacanam - nanda-gopa-sutaṃ devi patiṃ me kurute namaḥ iti
GR14jivrkadu:476: na kevalaṃ sādhāraṇa-rītyā dāmpatya-vyavahāras tābhir mama kintu
GR14jivrkadu:478: ātma-śabdasya manīvācakatvena tā man-manaskā (10.46.4) ity ādy uktaṃ punar uktaṃ syāt |
GR14jivrkadu:482: vyarocatādhikaṃ tāta puruṣaḥ śaktibhir yathā || iti |
GR14jivrkadu:483: tābhiḥ śaktibhir yathā yāvat tathā tatrātiśuśubhe tābhir bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ ity ādi
GR14jivrkadu:486: svarūpa-śaktitvād evādhikaṃ vyarocata ity ādy-uktam upapadyate |
GR14jivrkadu:488: | atas tāsāṃ lakṣmī-saṃjñatvam apy uktaṃ brahma-saṃhitāyāṃ
GR14jivrkadu:493: (end page 19) gopyo labdhvācyutaṃ kāntaṃ śriya ekānta-vallabham iti
GR14jivrkadu:494: (10.33.14) gopya eva śriya kāntaṃ manoharaṃ ekānta-vallabhaṃ raho-ramaṇam
GR14jivrkadu:495: | tasmāt nāyaṃ śriyo 'ṅga iti śukānuvādaḥ sāmānye lakṣmī-vijayaṃ vyanakti
GR14jivrkadu:508: anayor vallabhaḥ proktaḥ svāmī kṛṣṇākhya īśvaraḥ|
GR14jivrkadu:519: atra anekajanmasiddhānāṃ iti, bahūni me vyatītāni (end page 20) janmāni tava cārjuna [bg 4.5] itivat anādi-siddhatvam eva bodhayati |
GR14jivrkadu:520: patir eva ity eva-kāreṇa prakaṭa-līlāyām upapatitva-vyavahāras tu māyika evety
GR14jivrkadu:524: tad evam ādibhir viśiṣṭatvenaiva tad-ārādhanād āsāṃ nitya-preyasītvaṃ
GR14jivrkadu:531: tad-adhiṣṭhātṛ-devatā-rūpatvaṃ coktaṃ brahma-saṃhitāyāṃ prakṛtyā puruṣeṇa ca iti (5.3)
GR14jivrkadu:532: prakṛtir mantrasya svarūpas trayam eva śrī-kṛṣṇaḥ
GR14jivrkadu:534: tad evoktam ṛṣy-ādi-smaraṇe kṛṣṇaḥ prakṛtir iti |
GR14jivrkadu:536: varṇa-samudāya-rūpaṃ coktaṃ tatraiva - kāmaḥ kṛṣṇāyety (BrahmaS 5.24) ādinā |
GR14jivrkadu:540: ārādhya-rūpatvaṃ ca tatraiva brahma-saṃhitāyāṃ -- īśvaraḥ paramaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ
GR14jivrkadu:542: anādir ādir ity ādinā (5.1) kvicid durgāyā adhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ tu śakti-śaktimator abheda-vivakṣayā
GR14jivrkadu:543: ata uktaṃ gautamīya-kalpe - yaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ saiva durgā syād yā durgā kṛṣṇa eva sa iti |
GR14jivrkadu:544: yataḥ śrī-kṛṣṇas tatra svarūpa-śakti-rūpeṇa durgā nāma |
GR14jivrkadu:545: tasmān neyaṃ māyāṃśa-bhūtā durgā iti gamyate |
GR14jivrkadu:550: jānāty ekā parā kāntaṃ saiva durgā tad-ātmikā |
GR14jivrkadu:553: muhūrtād eva devasya prāptir bhavati nānyathā ||
GR14jivrkadu:560: yayā mugdhaṃ jagat sarvaṃ sarva-dehābhimāninaḥ || iti |
GR14jivrkadu:561: ataiva māyāṃ vyudasya cic-chaktyā kaivalye sthita ātmanīti prathamokteḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:562: na yatra māyā kim utāpare harer iti dvitīyokteḥ māyātīta-vaikuṇṭhāvaraṇa-kathane yathoktaṃ pādmottara-khaṇḍe -
GR14jivrkadu:564: śaṅkha-padma-nidhī lokāś caturthāvaraṇaṃ smṛtam || ity ady uktvā -
GR14jivrkadu:565: nityāḥ sarve pare dhāmni ye cānye 'pi divaukasaḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:572: ato nāma-mātra-sādhāreṇe 'nanya-bhaktair na vibhetavyaṃ kintu bhāgavatair
GR14jivrkadu:574: arcayitvā tu govindaṃ tadīyān nārcayet tu yaḥ ity ādi-vacanena tad-asatkāre
GR14jivrkadu:577: durgāṃ vināyakaṃ vyāsaṃ viṣvaksenaṃ gurūn surān |
GR14jivrkadu:578: sve sve sthāne tv abhimukhān pūjayet prokṣaṇādibhiḥ ||78|| (BhP 11.27.29)
GR14jivrkadu:582: tatas tābhiḥ saha tasya pūjana āvaśyakatā svataḥ siddhā |
GR14jivrkadu:583: atra punaḥ prativādī prāha, yadi tāḥ kṛṣṇasya nitya-priyāḥ, tarhi kathaṃ parakīyārūpatvam
GR14jivrkadu:586: satyaṃ tad-rūpatvaṃ māyikam iti vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī-nāmnyāṃ śrī-daśama-ṭippanyāṃ kṛṣṇa-sandarbhādau ca pramitam iti vistara-bhayān nātra prapañcitam |
GR14jivrkadu:597: dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ hariṃ tatra bhoktum aicchan suvigraham ||79||
GR14jivrkadu:598: te sarve strītvam āpannāḥ samudbhūtāś ca gokule |
GR14jivrkadu:599: hariṃ samprāpya kāmena tato muktā bhavārṇavāt ||80||
GR14jivrkadu:600: na ca vaktavyaṃ gokula-jātānāṃ prāpañcika-dehāditvaṃ na sambhavatīti |
GR14jivrkadu:602: śrī-devakī devyām api ṣaḍ-garbha-saṃjñakānāṃ janma śrūyate iti |
GR14jivrkadu:604: yata eva tathā vyākhyātaṃ striya urugendra-bhoga-bhuja-daṇḍa-viṣakta-dhiyo vayam apīti (BhP
GR14jivrkadu:605: gāyatrī ca tāsu jāteti pādme sṛṣṭi-khaṇḍe yathā brahmaṇā gopa-kanyāyā gāyatryā udvāhe gopeṣu śrī-viṣṇu-vākyam -
GR14jivrkadu:606: mayā jñātvā tataḥ kanyā dattā caiṣāviriñcaye |
GR14jivrkadu:608: avatāraṃ kariṣyāmi mat-kāntā tu bhaviṣyati || iti |
GR14jivrkadu:609: deva-kanyāś ca yathā śrī-daśame tat-priyārthaṃ sambhavantu sura-striya iti
GR14jivrkadu:611: ata sura-striyas tāsāṃ śrī-kṛṣṇa-priyāṇām upayogāyeveti gamyate |
GR14jivrkadu:612: atas tat-priyārtham ity evoktaṃ, na tu tat-prīty-artham iti |
GR14jivrkadu:614: gopyas tu ṛṣijā gopa-kanyakāḥ śrutijāḥ parāḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:615: deva-kanyāś ca rājendra na mānuṣyaḥ kadācana ||
GR14jivrkadu:619: | atas tāsāṃ svarūpa-śaktitvād eva śrī-bhagavatas tābhiḥ saha riraṃsā jātā
GR14jivrkadu:621: bhagavān api tā rātrīḥ śaradotphullamallikāḥ vīkṣya rantuṃ manaścakre yogamāyām upāśritaḥ || (BhP 10.29.1)
GR14jivrkadu:622: tā rātrīr vīkṣya uddīpanatvenānubhūyeti kaumutyenālambana-rūpāṇāṃ tāsāṃ
GR14jivrkadu:624: ātmārāmāś ca munayaḥ ity ādau itthambhūta-guṇo
GR14jivrkadu:625: harir itivat itthambhūta-guṇās tāḥ yena tādṛśy api tasya ramaṇcchā jāyate iti |
GR14jivrkadu:626: ataiva vyavahārārthaṃ tasya kaiśoram api mānitaṃ jātam iti śrī-viṣṇu-purāṇe darśitam |
GR14jivrkadu:628: reme tābhir ameyātmā kṣapāsu kṣaptāhitaḥ || (ViP 5.13.60) iti |
GR14jivrkadu:630: yuvatīr gopa-kanyāś ca rātrau saṅkālya kālavit |
GR14jivrkadu:631: kaiśorakaṃ mānayānaḥ saha tābhir mumoda ca || (HV 63.18) iti |
GR14jivrkadu:632: atra kālavid ity asya vyākhyānaṃ tā rātrīr vikṣyeti |
GR14jivrkadu:633: saha tābhir mumoda hetyasya sūcakaṃ rantuṃ manaś cakre iti |
GR14jivrkadu:635: śrī-kṛṣṇāya parama-puruṣatvaṃ darśitaṃ tasmāt hlādinī-śakti-vilāsa-lakṣaṇa-tat-prema-mayy evaiṣā riraṃsā |
GR14jivrkadu:644: śraddhānvito yaḥ śṛṇuyād atha varṇayed vā bhaktiṃ parāṃ bhagavati parilabhya kāmaṃ hṛd-rogam āśv apahinoty acireṇa dhīraḥ || (BhP 10.33.42) iti ||84
GR14jivrkadu:647: udaya-mātreṇa ca hṛd-rogaḥ śīghram apahriyate iti hi spaṣṭam eveti
GR14jivrkadu:649: yasya parṇamayī juhur bhavati na sa pāpaṃ ślokaṃ śṛṇotītivat |
GR14jivrkadu:650: na cādhikārī kaniṣṭha iti vācyaṃ dhīra ity uktatvāt |
GR14jivrkadu:651: atha darśana-mantre nāmāntareṇānirdiśya śrī-vallavīnāṃ nāma viśeṣam ālambyaiva svayaṃ bhagavato nirdeśāt tāsāṃ tat-paricāyakāṅga-rūpatvam eva bodhitam |
GR14jivrkadu:652: gopī-gopa-paśūnāṃ bahiḥ smared asya gīrvāṇa-ghaṭām ity ādi krama-dīpikāyāṃ (KD 3.32) gautamīya-tantre
GR14jivrkadu:654: vallavī-nandanaṃ vande kṛṣṇaṃ gopāla-rūpiṇam ||85 ity ādau -
GR14jivrkadu:661: atra sā tvāṃ brahman nṛpa-vadhūḥ kāmam āśu bhajiṣyatīti [BhP 3.21.28]
GR14jivrkadu:662: kardamaṃ prati śrī-śukla-vacanavac ca gopa-jātibhir nārībhir ity arthaḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:663: kṣobhayantaṃ mohayantaṃ muhur muhur iti vartamāna-dvaya-prayogena nityam eva tad-upāsakaiḥ paṭhyamāna-stavena gopī-kṛṣṇayoḥ nityatvam eva lakṣyate
GR14jivrkadu:664: | sanat-kumāra-kalpe ca gopāṅganā parivṛtaṃ mūle kalpataroḥ sthitam ity ādi |
GR14jivrkadu:670: phullendīvara-kāntim ity ādi evaṃ svāyambhuvāgamādāv api |
GR14jivrkadu:673: punaḥ prativādī prāha bhavatu nāma tāḥ pūjyāḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:674: kintu tāsāṃ nāma kutrāpi na śrutam |
GR14jivrkadu:682: daśamī tatheti daśamīty api - (end page 27) nāmaikaṃ tac cānvartham iti sarvānte paṭhitam
GR14jivrkadu:683: yad vā tatheti-daśamy api tārakā-nāmnīty arthaḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:684: tathā skānde prahlāda-saṃhitāyāṃ dvārakā-māhātmye māyāvasaraḥ prastāve uddhava-gamane (12.25-33) lakṣito vācety ādinā lalitā śyāmalā dhanyā
GR14jivrkadu:685: viśākhā rādhā śaivyā padmā bhadrā ity etāni aṣṭau gaṇitāni |
GR14jivrkadu:689: atha śata-koṭitvānyathānupapattyā tāsāṃ tan-mahā-śaktitvam eva gamyate |
GR14jivrkadu:694: śrī-rādhayā saha pratiyogitvam aitihyam asyātra virājate |
GR14jivrkadu:696: rādhā-mohana mandirād upāgataś candrāvalīm ūcivān rādhe kṣemamayeti tasya vacanaṃ śrutvāha candrāvalī |
GR14jivrkadu:697: kaṃsa kṣemamaye vimugdha-hṛdaye kaṃsaḥ kva dṛṣṭas tvayā rādhā kveti vilajjito nata-mukha-smero hariḥ pātu vaḥ ||90||
GR14jivrkadu:698: [*NOTE: This is a well-known verse, but is not in any of the Bilvamangala collections.]
GR14jivrkadu:699: tayor apy ubhayor madhye rādhikā sarvathādhikā |
GR14jivrkadu:702: rukmiṇī dvāravatyāṃ tu rādhā vṛndāvane vane |
GR14jivrkadu:704: devakī mathurāyāṃ ca pātāle parameśvarī || ity ādi |
GR14jivrkadu:706: atra rukmiṇī-saha-pāṭhād itthaṃ bodhayati yathā dvārakāyāṃ tasyā eva
GR14jivrkadu:712: atha yathā rukmiṇī-kṛṣṇayoḥ paraspara-śobhitvaṃ śrī-śukena varṇitam -
GR14jivrkadu:713: asyaiva bhāryā bhavitum ity ādināṃ [BhP 10.53.37] tathaiva rādhā-kṛṣṇayor
GR14jivrkadu:714: api ṛk-pariśiṣṭe śrutyā varṇitam rādhayā mādhavo devo mādhavenaiva rādhikā vibhrājante janeṣv ā iti |
GR14jivrkadu:715: vibhrājante vibhrājate ā samyak iti śruti-padārthaḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:716: darśitaṃ ca tasyāḥ svarūpaṃ bṛhad-gautamīye baladevaṃ prati śrī-kṛṣṇena -
GR14jivrkadu:717: sattvaṃ tattvaṃ paratvaṃ ca tattva-trayam ahaṃ kila |
GR14jivrkadu:720: sāttvikaṃ rūpam āsthāya pūrṇo 'haṃ brahma cit-paraḥ ||94||
GR14jivrkadu:721: brahmaṇā prārthitaḥ samyak sambhavāmi yuge yuge |
GR14jivrkadu:722: tvayā sārdhaṃ tayā sārdhaṃ nāśāya devatādruhām ||95|| iti |
GR14jivrkadu:723: atra sattvaṃ kāryatvaṃ tattvaṃ kāraṇatvaṃ paratvaṃ tato 'pi śraiṣṭhyaṃ yat tattva-trayaṃ tad aham ity arthaḥ tathaiva bodhayati tathaivāgre
GR14jivrkadu:745: ariṣṭena samaṃ tatra mahad yuddhaṃ pravartitam ||101||
GR14jivrkadu:748: snātas tatra tadā hṛṣṭo vṛṣaṃ hatvā sa-gopakaḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:749: vipā mā (?) rādhikāṃ prāha kathaṃ bhadre bhaviṣyati ||103||
GR14jivrkadu:751: sva-nāmnā viditaṃ kuṇḍaṃ kṛtaṃ tīrtham adūrataḥ ||104|| (end page 30)
GR14jivrkadu:756: atra satīṣv api sarvāsu tāsu asyā eva tena saha
GR14jivrkadu:760: bālye 'pi bhagavān kṛṣṇas taruṇaṃ rūpam āśritaḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:761: reme vihārair vividhaiḥ priyayā saha rādhayā ||
GR14jivrkadu:764: tasmin dine ca bhagavān rātrau rādhā-gṛhaṃ yayau |
GR14jivrkadu:765: sā ca kruddhā tam udare kāñcī-dāmnā babandha ha ||108||
GR14jivrkadu:767: priyāṃ prasādayāmāsa tataḥ sā tam avocayat ||109||
GR14jivrkadu:768: idaṃ covāca tāḥ kṛṣṇaḥ preyasī prīta-mānasaḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:769: kāñcī-dāma tvayā tanvi udare yan mayārpitam ||110||
GR14jivrkadu:770: dāmodareti me nāma priyaṃ tena śubhānane |
GR14jivrkadu:771: nātaḥ prītikaraṃ nāma mama lokeṣu vidyate ||111||
GR14jivrkadu:773: bhaktiṃ ca durlabhāṃ prāpya mama loke mahīyate ||112||
GR14jivrkadu:774: ulūkhale yadā mātrā baddho 'haṃ bhavitā priye |
GR14jivrkadu:776: udare dāmabhir loke tadā vyaktaṃ bhaviṣyati ||113||
GR14jivrkadu:777: anena nāma-mantreṇa yo 'smin māsi tvayā saha |
GR14jivrkadu:778: mām arcayed vidhānena sa labhet sarva-vāñchitam ||114|| iti |
GR14jivrkadu:779: atrāpi priyayā saha rādhayā iti śrī-kṛṣṇecchayā śrī-kṛṣṇavad bālye 'pi
GR14jivrkadu:785: tatra tādṛśa-bhāvair varṇanaṃ tasyāḥ śrī-śukadevenāpi kṛtam |
GR14jivrkadu:788: ity anena ekāmukhyā eke mukhyāny akevalā ity amaraḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:790: śrīmad-gopāla-tapanyāṃ yad gāndharvīti viśrutā sā tu saiva jñeyā |
GR14jivrkadu:797: prīty-arthaṃ tava deveśa dāmodara mayā saha ||117|| [HBV 16.172] [*NOTE:
GR14jivrkadu:804: vratinaḥ kārttike māsi snānasya vidhivan mama |
GR14jivrkadu:807: gṛhānārghyaṃ mayā dattaṃ rādhayā sahito hare ||119|| [HBV 16.174-175]
GR14jivrkadu:808: iti yugmatvena upādānāt tasyā eva śreṣṭhatvam |
GR14jivrkadu:812: cen nūnaṃ pādmānugataṃ syāt tarhi tatra tad-yugalo pāsanaṃ prakaṭataram eveti |
GR14jivrkadu:817: rādhā tad-bhāva-saṃlīnā vāsanāyā virāmitā ||120|| ity ādi |
GR14jivrkadu:818: atra tad-bhāva-saṃlīnā ity anena divyonmāda-maya-vacanaṃ madhupa
GR14jivrkadu:819: kitava-bandho ity ādikaṃ tasyā eveti vijñāpya sarvāsu gopīṣu tasyāḥ śreṣṭhyaṃ darśitam
GR14jivrkadu:822: tāsāṃ tām evoddhiśya tad idaṃ vacanaṃ śrūyate yathā -
GR14jivrkadu:823: anayārādhito nūnaṃ bhagavān harir īśvaraḥ yan no vihāya govindaḥ prīto 'yam anayad rahaḥ ||121|| (BhP 10.30.28)
GR14jivrkadu:824: apy eṇapatny upagataḥ priyayeha gātrais tanvan dṛśāṃ sakhi sunirvṛtim acyuto vaḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:828: bāhuṃ priyāṃsa upadhāya gṛhītapadmo rāmānujas tulasikālikulair madāndhaiḥ anvīyamāna iha vas taravaḥ praṇāmaṃ kiṃ vābhinandati caran praṇayāvalokaiḥ || (BhP 10.30.12) iti |
GR14jivrkadu:829: kiṃ bahunā asyāḥ saubhāgya-vāñchā dvārakā-mahiṣīṇām api śrūyate |
GR14jivrkadu:830: tatas tāsāṃ tādṛśa-vacanaṃ śrī-śukadevenāpy uditaṃ - yathā na vayaṃ sādhvi sāmrājyam ity ādy uktvā āhuḥ ----
GR14jivrkadu:834: gāvaś cārayato gopāḥ pāda-sparśaṃ mahātmanaḥ ||125|| iti |
GR14jivrkadu:839: taddarśanasmararujas tṛṇarūṣitena limpantya ānanakuceṣu juhus tadādhim ||126|| (BhP 10.21.17) ity anena |
GR14jivrkadu:841: dayitā-stana-maṇḍitena ity uktyā tat kuṅkumaṃ dayitā-stanatas tasya pade lagnam iti gamyate
GR14jivrkadu:844: tad idaṃ varṇayantīṣu tāsv api sā viśiṣṭety avagamyate |
GR14jivrkadu:845: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ śrītve prasiddhāyāḥ śriyas tatra kāmanaiva śrūyate |
GR14jivrkadu:847: yad vāñchayā śrīr lalanācarat tapo vihāya kāmān suciraṃ dhṛta-vratā iti [BhP
GR14jivrkadu:849: yā vai śriyārcitam ajādibhir āpta-kāmair ity ādi [BhP 10.47.62] uddhavasyāpi vākyāt |
GR14jivrkadu:850: na ca rukmiṇītve prasiddhāyāḥ śriyas tatra saṅgatiḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:853: śrī-sambandha-lālasā yuktā - nāyaṃ śriyo 'ṅga ity ādinā (10.47.60) tato
GR14jivrkadu:855: tasmād rukmiṇī dvāravatyāṃ tu rādhā vṛndāvane vane ity ādy ukta-siddhāntānusāreṇa sarvato vilakṣaṇā yā śrīr virājate tām
GR14jivrkadu:857: tataś ca tāsāṃ yathā tatra spṛhāspadatā tathāsmākaṃ paṭṭa-mahiṣīṇām iti |
GR14jivrkadu:865: vīkṣya rantuṃ manaścakre ity atraiva (BhP 10.29.1) nava-saṅgamasya
GR14jivrkadu:871: tasmād kadācid veṇu-kṛtākarṣāyās tasyā labdha-mūrcchāyā mūrcchāśāntaye sa-kuṅkume
GR14jivrkadu:872: svinne vakṣasi sambhramataḥ kevalena śrī-caraṇa-sañjīvanī-pallavena spṛśan gevādyāpi (end page 35)
GR14jivrkadu:873: vādyāpi samyak saṅkocānapagayamat drutam eva sa tasmān niścakrāmeti budhyate |
GR14jivrkadu:874: kāścit parokṣaṃ kṛṣṇasya sva-sakhībhyo 'nvavarṇayann iti uktavān |
GR14jivrkadu:875: yās tu tad-anyās tāsām eva pūrṇāḥ pulindyaḥ ity ādi vacanam |
GR14jivrkadu:876: tasmāt sādhv evoktam lakṣmīr abhitaḥ stritamā ity ādi |
GR14jivrkadu:881: garvād bheda-kṛtāvahela-vinaya-śrībhāji rādhānane sātaṅkānunayaṃ jayanti patitāḥ kaṃsadviṣaḥ dṛṣṭayaḥ ||127||
GR14jivrkadu:882: śrī-jayadevenāpi rādhām ādhāya hṛdaye tatyāja vraja-sundarīḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:888: muhūrtād eva devasya prāptir bhavati nānyathā |
GR14jivrkadu:891: ity utthāpita-pañcarātra-vacanaṃ sarvopari virājamānaṃ bhavatīty alam ativistareṇa pramāṇa-vacana-saṅgraheṇa
GR14jivrkadu:895: ataḥ sādhūktaṃ śrīdāmodara-rādhārcanam arhati vraja-sthānām ity ādi |
GR14jivrkadu:896: rādhā vṛndāvane yadvat tadvad dāmodaro hariḥ |
GR14jivrkadu:897: darśiteṣu ca śāstreṣu tad-yugmaṃ tat tad-īśituḥ ||
GR14jivrkadu:900: na viṣṇunā vinā devī na hariḥ padmajāṃ vinā |
GR14jivrkadu:904: kiṃ bahūktyā kuṇḍa-yugmaṃ tayor yugmena vīkṣyate |
GR14jivrkadu:905: śāstre ca darśitā tasmāt kaimutyād yugmatā tayoḥ ||
GR14jivrkadu:907: te bhajantāṃ bhajāmas tu rādhā-dāmodarau vayam ||
